data.name: Idle Champions - Nayeli Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get an AWESOME boost to your power with a full set of rare items and an exclusive Golden Epic for Nayeli! We'll also toss in 20 Gold Chests to power you up even more!

This pack includes:

  • Figurine of Wondrous Power (Golden Epic)
  • Ornate Breastplate (Rare)
  • Dwarven Mithral Shirt (Rare)
  • Paladin's Gauntlets (Rare)
  • Devoted Holy Symbol (Rare)
  • Strong Magical Greatsword (Rare)
  • 20 Gold Chests

fullgame.name: Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, or Windows 8 Classic
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
